titles.title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize travel and transportation allowances for family members to attend the funeral and memorial services of members of the uniformed services.
To amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize travel and transportation allowances for family members to attend the funeral and memorial services of members of the uniformed services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes travel and transportation allowances for family members to attend funeral and memorial services of members of the uniformed services.
